abstract.text: Creates a single-gate RNN gradient operation and returns the gradient tensor values.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: A tensor that contains the source data
A tensor containing the recurrent weights
the layout is [2,H,H] and otherwise it is [H,H].
this tensor must have a static shape.
The input gradient, that is the gradient of a tensor with respect to the first output of the forward pass.
A tensor containing the input weights matrix
- optional, if missing the operation assumes a diagonal unit-matrix.
the layout is [2H,I] and otherwise it is [H,I].
- optional, if missing the operation assumes zeroes. For
the layout is [2H] and otherwise it is [H].
The initial internal state of the RNN
- optional, if missing the operation assumes zeroes. For
the layout is [N,2H] and otherwise it is [N,H].
A descriptor that defines the parameters for the RNN operation.
array containing gradients for each input tensor, except for
, no gradient will be returned for it.
The order of the gradients will be: for
For details of this operation and parameters, refer to documentation of

abstract.text: Build, compile, and execute compute graphs utilizing all the different compute devices on the platform, including GPU, CPU, and Neural Engine.
The optimized representation of a compute graph of operations and tensors.
Creates a single-gate RNN operation and returns the value and optionally the training state tensor.
Creates a single-gate RNN gradient operation and returns the gradient tensor values.
The class that defines the parameters for a single gate RNN operation.
The symbolic representation of a compute data type.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
